articles.title: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays
articles.mainIdea: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays
articles.summary: Benzinga: Cathie Wood Dumps $11 Milllion Worth Of Tesla Stock While Doubling Down On These Notable Crypto Plays. On Thursday, Cathie Wood-led Ark Invest made significant trades involving Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA), Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN), and Brera Holdings PLC (NASDAQ:SLMT). The Tesla Trade Ark Invest executed a notable transaction by selling 23,110 shares of Tesla through its ARK Innovation ETF (BATS:ARKK). The sale, valued at approximately $11.2 million, comes amid a backdrop of Tesla’s stock pulling back after reaching all-time highs earlier in the week. articles.summary: Coinspeaker: Ark Invest Adds 17,386 More Coinbase Stock after System Upgrade Announcement. For the second time in less than one week, Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest has acquired more Coinbase (COIN) stock across its Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs). articles.summary: Barchart: Cathie Wood Keeps Buying the Dip in CoreWeave Stock. Should You?.
